overview:
VMS Capital is a finance & lending solutions business located in San Diego, California.

VMS Capital specializes in assisting business owners access the capital they require to grow their business, refinance their existing loans, or to capitalize on new business acquisition opportunities. VMS capital can assist you with financing when your company is turned down by a local bank or financial institution.

VMS Capital has relationships with numerous national lenders with less intrusive qualifying requirements and faster approvals on loan applications.

VMS Capital offers a wide range of finance products, such as SBA loans, Unsecured lines of credit, Merchant cash advance loans, Equipment leasing, Sale-leaseback, Account Receivable financing, Asset based lines of credit, Contract finance, Commercial real estate loans for acquisition financing or refinancing of existing loans with balloon payments approaching, Bridge loans, hard money loans, etc.
